Text:
excellent indeed, one of the uk's most underated and masterful guitarists,
non of your pop claptrap with this lad,
if you've never heard him before . . . take a listen . . . then a bit more . . .yes ! you've got it,
you have just discovered at long last the mighty and influential Robin Trower  xx big thanks to you 4 posting this xx

As Slackalice said: this is a very underated guitarist. 

Thanks!

For a great video of Robin

Robin Trower - Rock Goes To College BBC-TV 1980

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3671401
Fantastic, thank you for making these available!  Some of these sound like studio takes...
